titleStmt.title: The nurses bosome· A sermon vvithin the Greene-yard in Norwich. On the guild-day when their maior takes his oath. On Tuesday Iune 18. 1616. Preached by the parson of Southwalsham. Hereunto is added, Iudahs penance, the sermon preached at Thetford before the iudges in Lent. Mar. 10. 1616.
titleStmt.author: Younger, William, b. 1572 or 3.

titleStmt.title: The nurses bosome· A sermon vvithin the Greene-yard in Norwich. On the guild-day when their maior takes his oath. On Tuesday Iune 18. 1616. Preached by the parson of Southwalsham. Hereunto is added, Iudahs penance, the sermon preached at Thetford before the iudges in Lent. Mar. 10. 1616.

notesStmt.note: "Iudahs penance" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
A variant of the edition with Edmund Causon named as publisher in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
